summary: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will accept her as one of their own."
cast: Richard E. Grant|Catherine O'Hara|Nick Prideaux|Michael Feast|Christina Ricci|Ronni Ancona|Simon Woods|Paul Herbert|Simon Chandler|Peter Dinklage|Andi-Marie Townsend|John Voce|Burn Gorman|Andrew Bailey|James McAvoy|Nick Frost|Eve Pearce|Rob Rouse|William Willoughby|Rubria Negrao|Ross Boatman|Nigel Havers|Richard James|Lenny Henry|Tallulah Evans|Pam Phillips|Richard Leaf|Reese Witherspoon|Russell Brand|Martin McDougall|James Howard|Shaun Parkes|Paul Viragh|Christina Greatrex|Cornelius Booth|Colin Marsh|Tom Barker|Todd Boyce|Amaka Oditah|Preston Nyman|Rosie Stewart|Katie Hughes|Francesca Edgerton|Abigail Chan|Pheobe Llewellyn|Shane James Bordas|Nigel Martin Davey|Simon Duric|Christopher Fosh|Matt Rippy|Nick Shafer|Kit Sinnett
keywords: magical realism|rich parents|female protagonist|scarf|mother daughter relationship
title: Penelope
